Strings.Text: {scroll 0}\nWhat the hell?{scroll 1}{clear 51}{scroll 0}\nLet's report this to Wesker.{scroll 1}{timed 70}
{scroll 0}Kenneth was killed too.\nMaybe by this creature.{scroll 1}{timed 135}
There may be more here\nworth investigating...
I've got to report this to\nWesker...
It's the hollow that an\nemblem was in...
There is no time to check\nit...
It's dark outside and I\ncan't see very far...
There's a hollow space\nbeneath the shield...
